statusDetails.message:
XFAIL Docs say image descriptions should only be returned when include_images=True. Backend still returns them without include_images.

AssertionError: assert 5 == 0
 +  where 5 = len([{'description': 'Cristiano Ronaldo is smiling broadly while wearing a dark athletic shirt, exuding confidence and positivity against a blurred background.', 'url': 'https://cdn.beahero.gg/2024/09/Cristiano-Ronaldo.jpg'}, {'description': 'Cristiano Ronaldo is depicted wearing a yellow sports jersey with blue lettering while appearing focused and ready for action.', 'url': 'https://www.mundodeportivo.com/us/uploads/2023/09/29/6517050ab5f2c.jpeg'}, {'description': 'Cristiano Ronaldo is depicted with a thoughtful expression, wearing a yellow training bib and looking upwards, likely during a match or warm-up.', 'url': 'https://static.independent.co.uk/2023/11/04/20/2ecbab95abab449b1f79a2904946117fY29udGVudHNlYXJjaGFwaSwxNjk5MjE0NTg2-2.72982810.jpg'}, {'description': "Cristiano Ronaldo, wearing a red Portugal jersey with the number 7, celebrates confidently while raising his fist, showcasing his leadership as the team's captain.", 'url': 'https://www.planetsport.com/image-library/square/1200/c/cristiano-ronaldo-portugal-5-june-2022.jpg'}, {'description': 'Cristiano Ronaldo is wearing a red Portugal national team jersey, making a gesture with clasped hands and a determined expression on his face.', 'url': 'https://cdn.theathletic.com/app/uploads/2024/07/01182200/GettyImages-2160138281-scaled-e1719872563203.jpg'}])

labels.name: tag
labels.value: @pytest.mark.xfail(reason='Docs say image descriptions should only be returned when include_images=True. Backend still returns them without include_images.', strict=False)
